generate basaltic_mineral_sand sand
hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/basaltic_mineral_sand
lang.en Basaltic Mineral Sand

hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/cassiterite_sand
lang.en Cassiterite Sand

hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/garnet_sand
lang.en Garnet Sand

generate granitic_mineral_sand sand
hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
texture strata:blocks/sand/granitic_mineral_sand
lang.en Granitic Mineral Sand

generate quartz_sand sand
hardness 1.0
sustains Beach Desert
convertsTo minecraft:sand
furnaceResult minecraft:glass
texture strata:blocks/sand/quartz_sand
lang.en Quartz Sand

generate volcanic_ash sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/volcanic_ash
lang.en Volcanic Ash

generate glauconite sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/glauconite
lang.en Glauconite Sand

generate diatomite sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/diatomite
textureCaps strata:blocks/sand/diatomite_caps
blockState strata:proto_cube_ym
lang.en Diatomerous Earth

generate sulfur sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/sulfur
lang.en Sulfur

generate oil_sand sand
hardness 1.0
texture strata:blocks/sand/oil_sand
lang.en Oil Sand
